PERCY BALASURIYA – It is with deep sadness that we announce the passingaway of Percy Balasuriya,​ a retired Teacher of St. Anne’s College,​ Kurunegala. He was the beloved husband of the late Kamala,​ loving father of Indika and Dumindri,​ devoted brother of Berti,​ Richard,​ Kusum and Nanda and the loving father-in-law of Upuli. Remains will lie at Jayaratne,​ Lotus Funeral Parlour,​ Borella from 8.30 a.m. on 7th April 2024 and the funeral will take place the same day at 5.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery Borella.
